website_summaries.verdict: A convenient powder probiotic that also works well as a gentle laxative.
pros: Comes in powder packets you can mix in with applesauce or yogurt
Also free of gluten and sugar
Can be used by any child over 1 year of age
Doesn't cause either gas or bloating discomfort
Gets good results for kids with autism, ADHD, and anxiety
cons: More of a long-term solution to constipation rather than an instant fix
Can have problems dissolving well when mixed with food and drinks

customer_reviews.title: Answer to my prayers
customer_reviews.text: We have tried everything for our 15 month old son who has been battling constipation since he stopped breastfeeding- at 3 months. I have been against miralax- we've tried prunes, flax, high fiber diet with plenty of water and nothing helped. He was holding poop in, bleeding- traumatized everytime he had to go. Awful for everyone. We have been using this for almost two weeks and what a difference!! If you are at your wits end and thinking of miralax- try this first
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the Miralax!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old was struggling with crazy constipation that would only clear up with dr. recommended Miralax. None of the natural remedies worked (prunes, etc) and she would regularly go for 10 days without pooping. This would only come to an end after 3 days of Miralax and then 4 FULL DIAPERS back to back. So sad and frustrating to deal with. Well.. my trouble are over, people! One packet of this in her morning water bottle today and she pooped right after lunch! (What?! So shocked!) While this isn’t the all natural remedy I was hoping for, I’ll definitely take it over the Miralax any day!
customer_reviews.author: Becca R.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: My son, at 3 years old, had severe constipation. We tried everything. He was even given enemas by his pediatrician. We started using culturelle regularity and he immediately started having normal bowel movements. Every morning the powder gets mixed in his juice and he drinks it no problem. **mix with a spoon while you pour in the powder, otherwise it chunks up**. We have been on it for 2years and things have been great! This has been the miracle product we have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 year Old
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter has a hard time staying regular. We have battled with this since she started potty training over a year and a half ago. This has helped get on a schedule with regular bowel movements.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sanders

customer_reviews.title: we think it's helping, seems better than the probiotic for us, sometimes hard to mix
customer_reviews.text: One of my kids has issues with pooping, only going about twice a week and struggling when it does come out. We're in the process of trying different things and we've tried both Culturelle products (probiotic and this gentle-go). The probiotic mixes much easier, but don't believe has made much of a difference. We think the gentle-go has been helping, but no consistent results. It takes some effort to mix in juice and sometimes there is residue or clumps.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Great drug free option
customer_reviews.text: Struggled with constipation since my daughter was a year old. Using this product has helped greatly and I haven't had to give her Miralax in over a week - longest she's gone without it in months! It does clump if you don't mix very well, I stir it as I am pouring it into her milk. I haven't tried to taste but it doesn't seem to bother her at all.
customer_reviews.author: justjan

customer_reviews.title: This definitely works when used regularly!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a life changer for my son. He has been on Miralax since the age of two due to extreme constipation. However every time we would try to wean him off, he would back up for a week or more and it led to so many years and stress over bowel movements! Now I put one packed of Culturelle in his morning chocolate milk and he goes much more regularly. It isn’t perfect, he still gets constipated, but never more than 3 days now. This doesn’t create stools loose either which is a huge plus. Happy customer and MUCH happier kid!
customer_reviews.author: Lisdafied

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my son.
customer_reviews.text: This really worked for my son, he was having a really hard time being regular with his bm and would be constipated a lot. I came across this and it worked very well. Also if your child is like mine that does not like drinking anything else besides water, well this is a good option too because it has no flavor and it dissolves in water just fine. I also tried the gummy probiotics, but those were a no go, so this was the best option for a picky child.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Vega

customer_reviews.title: I love cuturelle gentle go
customer_reviews.text: I love cuturelle gentle go....usually. In the past, it is the only thing that keeps my toddler regular. This time was different. I would give her the supplement, but it seemed to not help as much. Then I realized they were expired:( I will try them again, but with a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Worth a shot!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Bought to help keep my kids regular. I do 1/2 a packet once a day for each of them mixed with juice. I’ve been using for a few weeks with my 8 and 8.5 year old boys and they seem to be more regular. The consistency of their poop is much softer and they go more frequently. I did notice one of my boys has the urgency to go more than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Compton

customer_reviews.title: EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give my daughter while she was on antibiotics. It doesnt taste great, but she took it anyway because I explained it would help prevent "hot pee" (which she has experienced while on antibiotics before). Not only was this stuff effective in preventing her from getting a yeast infection, but it also helped her poo. To any moms with kids struggling with poo withholding, this is HUGE. My daughter struggled with it for years and we tried EVERYTHING. I firmly believe this product got us onto the road to success. Almost 3 months of success! PS - THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J. Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Hidden Ingredients!!
customer_reviews.text: From the box: Other ingredients: Wheat Dextrin, inulin, Kiwi Fruit Powder, Silicon Dioxide, Sucrose, Maltodextrin, Sodium Ascorbate.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to us by a lot of people. They said t helped their child get regular so we jumped on it. However my child got the absolute worst diarrhea and diaper rash. It made her bowel movements so acidic she would scream every time she had to go. We stopped giving it to her, gave her a week to clear everything up, and started again with o lay a quarter of a packet at a time to see if that would help. It happened again, and the stomach cramps she got were horrifying for an almost 3 year old. This product may work for some People but it did not for ours. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Glad our pediatrician recommended these
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought these because my son was having issues with occasional constipation. A day or so after they came my son was put on a very strong antibiotic and his pediatrician recommended these by name to try and keep his belly happy while taking the meds. So far they have kept him from having upset stomachs while taking these antibiotics and they have kept him regular. If anything changes once the antibiotic is finished I will update my review but overall I am happy with these and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: KLuv

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing works way better more natural than mirelax or nasty prune juice
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My 3 year old. Very picky eater had lots of problems with constipation. This product is a life saver after 2days of using it he has been regular ever since. It even helped with his potty training. Whe he would get really constipated he would hide to go because it hurt his belly. Had tried lots of things and this stuff works like magic. I just use it 2xs a day in his food or drink and he has been regular for a mo now and over all health seems so much better. He even just gets in the potty himself to go which was a battle before cause of the constipation. This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Cain

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has struggled with severe constipation for 12 of her 18 months of life. She would get beat red and scream in pain. I’ve tried puréed prunes, regular prunes and prune juice among other foods. I didn’t want to use miralax so I gave this a shot since we had her on the regular probiotics. This helped immensely. She goes now and. She’s healthy and happy. Better for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Julared

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: My son has had chronic constipation since the day he was born basically. He has suffered for so many years, but now he suffers a lot less since starting him on this probiotic. It works, really well. He doesn't struggle nearly as much as he used to.. there was a couple days we forgot to give it to him and he went right back to old ways.. this stuff definitely works. It is worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C

customer_reviews.title: Nothing worked for my kids.....until THIS!!! Yay!!
customer_reviews.text: All four of my kids have had terrible gas and constipation right from birth. Healthy diets, plenty of water, veggie smoothies, vitamins, lots of fiber, NOTHING ever worked....until THIS!!! I even had two of my kids taking aloe water and miralax every day for years. Years! Then I tried this product - mixes very well with juice, I give it once a day. Keeps them regular with softer stool so no constipation. Definitely worth it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Ann F. Garber

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time buying this
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a dramatic change with my kid’s digestive system. He is not bloated like before since we started it around 7 months ago. If he misses one day he does gets a bit constipated though. For now I’m a loyal and returning customer! I use it on his food and he doesn’t mind the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Rise G.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with consistency
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES dairy. And we try to limit how much he eats of it, but some days (if you have or had a toddler) you know the fight just isnt worth it. Pick your battles, amiright? When he doesnt eat well (which isnt that often), he becomes a little constipated. I started giving this to him daily with his milk and he doesnt notice. Mixes okay with a spoon in his sippy cup and he drinks it with no issue. He definitely seems much more comfortable with bowel movements, in general, regardless of his diet.
customer_reviews.author: Blue's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Toddler with bathroom issues
customer_reviews.text: My tough toddler actually cannot tell that a packet is in his juice (I mix half apple juice and half water). He is VERY picky so he would pick up on any taste or texture. It dissolved quickly and easily. I rotate this every other day with prune juice only on the alternate days and my toddler who would only to every 4-5 days is now going every other day consistently. This took a couple of weeks to regulate him though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy toddler tummy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter caught a bad stomach virus and then developed a cows milk intolerance and her stomach microflora was very out of sync. After weeks of throwing up and diarreah, the doctor recommended this. It has helped her to stay regular and to help her stomach heal from weeks and weeks of puking. I highly recommend this probiotic. Plus I love that it has added fiber! Please click the “helpful” button if you found this review helpful to you!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Children with constipation issues
customer_reviews.text: These are flavorless which allows me to put it in any drink for my littles. We switched to this in order to better aid the littles digestion. Worked better than miralax plus it’s meant to maintain their GI track. Presentation was given 2 because my box came smashed, but it was during the corona virus time frame. I enjoy this product so much so that I have subscribed in order to ensure I always have it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Doise

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work...
customer_reviews.text: I HATE this product...I wanted to love it so much. I read so many of the reviews and was excited to try this for my severely constipated toddler who only goes when we use pedialax, which has traumatized him. Unfortunately, days after using this I realised it wasnt gonna work for him. He became extremely flatulent. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dreaana

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS:)!
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this product for exactly a week now and OMG !!!!!we tried everything trust me when I say EVERYTHING!’ Our 3 year old daughter has been battling constipation since she was 3 months old . I have used miralax- we've tried prunes juice ,flax, high fiber diet with plenty of water, cutting down carbs, corn syrup in juice suppositories and nothing helped. She was bleeding traumatized everytime she had to go. Awful for everyone. We have been using this for a week and what a difference she’s starting to regulate herself and I couldn’t be happier ! I recommend this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Whilmy Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday for my toddler who has bowel issues. He has had no bad reactions to it and since I picked the no flavor, he does not detect it in his pediasure. Sometimes if not mixed well there’s lumps but if mixed good there isn’t any lumps on it. So even with the thickness of the pediasure it is able to be mixed in good.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmine

customer_reviews.title: Works well, will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works well to keep my toddler regular. He was having a lot of issues with his bowel and his pediatrician recommended Mirilax. It was too hard on his stomach and made him miserable. He has been taking this for less than a week and now has normal stools and does not seem to be in discomfort. I definitely recommend to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Culturelle MIRACLE!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had severe constipation since about 8 months old. We tried everything and decided to get him off miralax after about a year (very minute does but still wanted him off). We started using culturelle regularity and he immediately started having normal bowel movements. Every morning the powder gets mixed in his milk and he drinks it no problem. This has been the miracle product we have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Octi

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My stubborn 2yo girl refuses to drink water so her lips are usually dry and has hard poop! I mix this packet daily with diluted apple juice for the past 3wks and I noticed a huge difference in her defecation patterns. She used to cry all the time whenever she does #2 and small tinge blood when I wiped her. Glad I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids - 100% Better!
customer_reviews.text: This really worked (took 30 days, 2x per day to show improvement) and my little girl is so much happier!
customer_reviews.author: Louis A. Perrotta III

customer_reviews.title: It’s a life saver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has suffered with digestive issues from the beginning (acid reflux, constipation, etc.) since he was born. Once he turned one, he was constipated everyday for 9 months! We tried everything including probiotics. I read the reviews to this and figured I would try. At first, nothing was working. I realized I started this and his new vitamin together so I stopped his vitamin. Once I used this by itself, he hasn’t had constipation since! It’s has been a rough battle but he finally regular!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing for my kiddo who couldn’t poop!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a son who has had pooping problems since he was little. He’s now 3 and was still having problems getting backed up. I decided to give this a try after trying multiple Other things. He takes one a day in juice and has gone from not pooping to going almost every day or every other day!! Going poop is no longer such a struggle and he no longer cried because of being backed up. This has been a life saver!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She's also pretty picky, but she doesn't notice this in water ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked wonders for our kids. We were hesitant to start potty training until we'd found a solution to our daughter's constipation. She doesn't have to take it every day, we just use it when we notice she's starting to have a hard time and it takes all the fear away for her. She's also pretty picky, but she doesn't notice this in water or applesauce, it's truly tasteless.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Beth

customer_reviews.title: No more Mirilax and Stomach Pains
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has suffered from constipation and stomach pain issues since she was 3. Shes 7 now. GI dr put her on Mirilax. Got her moving but made her dehydrated, gave headaches, and made her extra emotional. Was told to put her on a fiber supplement so after reading reviews I thought to try. It's been a life saver. No more stomach pains and bowels at least once every other day but mostly daily. This along with minimizing dairy and weve found something that's working for now. So grateful!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Nuera

customer_reviews.title: Seems to alleviate constipation
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product with our granddaughter (almost 3 now) when we have her. Her mom & dad use it as well. As a one-year old, she was prone to constipation. A small amount of this probiotic in her morning bottle alleviated the problem. We've always used this "Regularity" version. So we can't comment on the other types that come from Culturelle and have similar packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old has struggled with constipation for years. I have had to use miralax but then would get diarrhea easily then one day without be severely constipated again. This daily has help tremendously with daily bowel movements and most of the time fairly easy to pass! Better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gandhi

customer_reviews.title: but its a good product and ill continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: my 7 year old is always constipated. i give her a sachet everyday with her milk and she doesn't feel the taste that much and it helps allot!...maybe the stool isnt soft but at least it helps her to go to the loo every day.....they have changed the flav, my previous box was prune and now its only apple, i dont know whats the difference or why they did that. but its a good product and ill continue to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Dubai

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my child
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT work for my child. He is constipated occasionally and we thought maybe this would eliminate the need to use prune juice to make him go. Nope. We used the entire box and no change. Still constipated just as often. Maybe a bad batch? I don’t know. Just know this doesn’t work for every child.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wow Wow & Wow!
customer_reviews.text: PRO: Let me start off by saying how happy I am with this product! My 1 year old has been constipated for almost 2 days. I mixed some of this prebiotic into her Yogurt & within he hour she was finally able to go number 2 with no struggles. I will continue to purchase this! CON: It doesn’t really mix well in water or yogurt but my daughter didn’t seem to notice.
customer_reviews.author: Tiphany

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 year gets constipated somewhat regularly and this does the trick! We mix a packet in with her water and she’s none the wiser. Is difficult at times to dissolve all of the powder and a few clumps may linger, but my daughter doesn’t seem to notice. Will give her up to two packets a day if the first doesn’t work within several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: One was broken and leaked powder
customer_reviews.text: One of the powders was broken and got powder everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: They changed the formulation
customer_reviews.text: We started using about a year ago and it worked great - cleared up my toddler's constipation within a few days, and she was much less cranky. But they changed the formulation about 6 months ago and now it doesn't work as well, and causes a lot of gas. Wish they hadn't changed it, it worked so well before!
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Flavorless
customer_reviews.text: It is flavorless so you can easily put it in drinks and the kids dont mind.
customer_reviews.author: JTAz

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! We tried all kinds of products for our chronically constipated toddler. We just put this in his milk and he's none the wiser. He's been having regular soft poops for two months now! We are all so relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really help my son
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son, who usually goes everyday but it’s always very hard and gets impactions very often, to hopefully help him go. He usually still goes at least once a day. I’ve been giving him this twice a day for 3 days and he has NOT gone to the bathroom yet! It’s unlike him not to go at all. I’m thinking this is making it worse instead of better. Green juice usually makes him go, so I guess I’m going to have to go back to just giving him that.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! My son was cured.
customer_reviews.text: My son was severely constipated for years. He always complained about how hard the poop was & that it hurt. We tried everything from Miralax to fiber gummies, cutting out dairy, etc. We started him on this & it took between 2-3 packs a day for a week until his poop got soft. He started pooping regular again. He has now stopped taking these for almost a month now & is still pooping great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Alejandro  Lopez

customer_reviews.title: That it works
customer_reviews.text: Really the best stuff my 2 year old has had difficulty since she she was born tried everything NOTHING worked but THIS!!!! So happy I gave it a try 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Constipation has been a huge problem for us for over a year now and with this probiotic my little one is back on schedule. Love it! We started with 3 a day for a couple if weeks, then hit to two and now about 2 months later we are only using one a day and very happy with the results. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ivan petrov

customer_reviews.title: Best solution for constipation
customer_reviews.text: My baby has been dealing with constipation since she was 6 months old. We tried apple juice, prune purée, and nothing worked. We were using liquid glycerin suppositories every 5 days, which were a nightmare for my baby. We decided to give it a try to these probiotics before starting Miralax and wow!! These are amazing! She finally had a bowel movement after 5 days of using it and afterwards she is pooping everyday or every others day. I highly recommend this product!! 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ricardo Moreira

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for 3 year olds
customer_reviews.text: The thing with this product is that is not a one size fits all type of deal. It works with my 3 year old as long as he eats partially healthy ( pigs will fly before that is consistent with my picky eater) I give him this every day once per day with water and an apple and he will go ever 4-5 days. So it helps but our situation will be different from yours. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: First Day booom baby!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was in excellent condition, I gave my son who is 3 the first little pack around lunch time with some juice and water then I gave him another little pack with his dinner.. let’s just say 2 hours later he stopped in his tracks and said “I gotta go potty”!! He has had some issues with proper bowel movements and constipation for a while but today was wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless & it works to keep my child regular
customer_reviews.text: This product has done amazing for my son. It keeps him regular, my son doesn’t even know it was added to his drink. Only down side, make sure you sprinkle it in slowly while stirring. Otherwise if you dump it all at once, it stays as a large lump. I have continued to purchase this product & would recommend it if your child has an issue with irregular bowel movements. Keeps him regular.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: We finally found something that really helps our little grandson go regularly
customer_reviews.text: . Up to when we found this product our grandson was severely constipated, now he goes every morning! , he is very picky about what he eats, I just put a packet of this in his pudding, or applesauce, and he doesn't even know he is taking anything Yay we love this product
customer_reviews.author: Mister D

customer_reviews.title: Great product-poor handling/packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product wise—it really works. I gave 4 stars just because of the packaging (or maybe handling). It arrived as shown in the picture. The box of the product itself must have been pressed or something. But the product is really good. It does not have any aftertaste. I have bought this before at walmart then just opted to buy on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tmnl

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who was having issues going to the bathroom. I was skeptical that it would work any better than the Benefiber we were already using, but over the last few weeks she has been going every 1-2 days and it’s not the struggle it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ana B

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a God send! My twin boys were premature, so a bit on the tiny side (even at almost 3 years old). Our pediatrician recommended Culterelle for them. I was ecstatic to see there was one with fiber included, as one of the twins has a constipation problem. This helps him go every day. Much cheaper on Amazon than in stores too!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Bendler

customer_reviews.title: I put this in juice for my 5 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in juice for my 5 year old daughter... keeps her regular and she doesn't even know it's in there!
customer_reviews.author: It'smeJill

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you about the flavor I have no idea. My daughter gets constipated rather easy so I give her one when she’s having issues and with in a few hours she’s had her bm and it’s soft. I pour it into her milk. She drinks it all and has never once complained.
customer_reviews.author: FamBam5

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: My son was suffering from constipation. We tried so many things, but nothing would work. After 1 week on Culturelle 2 times a day, he began having regular bowel movements!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W Huebner

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my almost 3 year old who was having trouble using the bathroom consistently. Within a few days he started to go everyday and it was much easier for him. I mix it in with water and a splash of juice and he doesn’t even notice. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a few months with our 6 yr old son as an alternative to Miralax. It definitely has been keeping him regular so no complaints there. Would give it 5 stars if it dissolved better like Miralax. We mix it only in milk and it takes a lot of vigorous stirring to avoid clumps. It was very clumpy when mixed with juice.
customer_reviews.author: RyMommy

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely a life saver for my family. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a life saver for my family. My 4 year old has trouble with bowel movements so e give him this every morning in his chocolate milk. He can't taste it in there at all but it makes potty time much less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Helps!
customer_reviews.text: This certainly helps the young ones with chronic constipation. This worked when nothing else helped. I've now started taking it because I have the same issue and it works for me too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: If your kids eat processed foods ever, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: Grown-ups might not think about kids being constipated, but it happens and it’s miserable for them! If your kids eat any kind of processed foods, you need this to help them be regular.
customer_reviews.author: Deena R Miller

customer_reviews.title: Prunes work better
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes that it would help my 1 year olds constipation & unfortunately it did not help . I’d give it to her 3 times a day and no results . Fortunately prunes have worked perfectly and that’s how I keep her regular.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: This works! No flavor and dissolves easily
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old is on the spectrum and really suffers with constipation. His pediatrician and GI Dr keep pushing Miralax and it makes him self injurous. Milk of Magnesium worked for a while but when we added this fiber/ probiotic last week it seems to be helping a lot. No flavor and so far no changes to his behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Bun & Sams Mom

customer_reviews.title: It really works fast!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! My 3.5 year-old was constantly constipated, and this probiotic/fiber combination worked within 24 hours. We put the powder in applesauce, and after only 3 doses he had a BM that he smoothly passed. We're planning to give him one packet daily to keep him regular.
customer_reviews.author: Angela A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: They are great for kids with constipation issues. We have tried a few things and this has been the one my toddler likes the most and the one that actually makes her go easily
customer_reviews.author: Emily S Huy

customer_reviews.title: Our pediatrician recommended this to us
customer_reviews.text: Its too early to tell if its working but we love that our little one gulps it down with no complaints. It doesn't really have a flavor so it just like drinking water (atleast that what my kiddo says).
customer_reviews.author: Sneha Tammineedi

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for toddler’s constipation
customer_reviews.text: We give this to our 2 year old every morning to help with ongoing constipation. We mix it in his milk and the taste/texture isn’t bothersome. It’s a bit pricey in my opinion, but has been worthwhile and he’s been taking it daily for about a year now.
customer_reviews.author: WeLoveOllie

customer_reviews.title: Might need to try it again
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old was very constipated and wouldn't poop for 3 days. It would end up in her struggling because it was so hard and big to pass. Her doctor first suggested this and I was giving 1 packet a day. After 2 weeks it didn't work - like zero change/difference in my daughter so we moved to Miralax which works wonders. However, I don't want her on that for a long time, so maybe I"ll give this a chance again with doing 2 packets a day.
customer_reviews.author: CJLG20

customer_reviews.title: When used correctly works great
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome if you can remember to use them everyday. My 1 year old has had an issue with hard stools and when I can remember to give this to her everyday it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your kid on the regular
customer_reviews.text: My little guy was potty training and holding it in. He went 5 days without going. Then we started using this and it made him go every other day and it wasn't hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley P.

customer_reviews.title: I think better than Miralax
customer_reviews.text: Really helps well with kid constipation, I think better than Miralax. I find it best to mix in yogurt, my child doesn't even know. Tried it in his Chocolate Milk and he noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: My 🐈 's chronic constipation resolved
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old cat was hospitalized several times due to chronic constipation in the past. Then I tried this. Now she let me pick her up since her pain from the constipation is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Shawnee

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this when I was younger!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Keeps my little one regular without causing her pain or the feeling of constantly needing to go. She has the biggest poops and this makes it easier for them to come out.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: No more crying by the bathroom door
customer_reviews.text: For year and years we've been dealing with our now 10 year old being severely constipated. I would sit and cry by the bathroom feeling helpless when he would run back and forth trying to pass an enormous bowel movement because he's been backed up for almost 2 weeks. 1 day on this product and results same day!!! It's the answer to our prayers.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best for constipated kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 10m baby was having constant constipation issues. Was only pooping once a week for over a month. She was crying for an hour trying to poop even when we have her prunes and other poop foods.... We bought this to try and finally got relief. We not mix this with her puree in the morning and she is regularly pooping!
customer_reviews.author: Coreen

customer_reviews.title: Not good for small kids
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3year old and can't make her drink this.
customer_reviews.author: Extra Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Good potty helper
customer_reviews.text: This has helped our 3 yr old boy go potty more regularly. I put it in his milk and he never knows. I think it is a little high for what it is but I would buy again as it does help.
customer_reviews.author: Volgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works so well for toddler constipation!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff WORKS! My 18 month old frequently has constipation. I knew it was a lack of fiber. She’s such a picky eater. Started these packets every other day and now she’s really regular again. No more painful poops. Definitely worth a try over any of the unnatural meds available
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy way for kids to take probiotic
customer_reviews.text: My kids took these mixed with applesauce, yogurt and water- without a problem. Easy way to get probiotics in them when they were on antibiotics
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and works great.
customer_reviews.text: This was to help aid our kid with her constipation. Typically this works for us but every kid is different. This also tastes pretty good and is also easy to hide in milk or other beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan L

customer_reviews.title: Other ingredients has changed
customer_reviews.text: Product helps with my daughter’s constipation. Would have been a 5 star but the ingredients have changed - added wheat dextrin as the first other ingredient. Now I’m on the hunt for any box I can find with Inulin listed as the first other ingredient. Also, every box I have purchased recently has had an expired 3/31/18 $2.00 coupon.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley A Breneman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for constipation with toddler
customer_reviews.text: These were a life saver for our 2 year old. It took about a week to fully see the effects (2 packets a day in his milk) and we have rarely had any issues with constipation. He doesn’t even know we added anything to his drink.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Linden

customer_reviews.title: Helped with constipation, and possibly boosted up immune system?
customer_reviews.text: As expected, my 1.5-year old got sick pretty frequently during the first few weeks when she started daycare. Between these probiotics, washing her hands right after she got in the car, and keeping a balanced diet, she stopped getting sick pretty quickly! And, she hasn't had the constipation problems she had always had! No more Miralax!
customer_reviews.author: Qingqing

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These have really helped my son with his constipation issues. I can’t tell when I skip them and when I don’t. Will defiantly be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not very soluble
customer_reviews.text: My son would not eat any food with this mixed in. It thickened everything to a paste like consistency. Tried several different food delivery options for this but he hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Clumps
customer_reviews.text: Easy to give to kids. Do wish it mixed better though without clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Product box it's open.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for several time but It's the second time the product box it's already opened, so I'm not sure if it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: Abel de León.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a daily probiotic that will help my 6 year old not only "go" everyday, but have looser stool. I didn't want to rely on miralax constantly and Culturelle for kids seems to do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Y

customer_reviews.title: Helps toddler stay regular
customer_reviews.text: Basically it helps my 2 year old go poop every day. I only use 1/3 of the packet each day and it keeps her regular. My 3 year old on never had any issues in that area, so I’m not sure what it is that I need to change in her diet, but this helps!
customer_reviews.author: AUTUMN

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a probiotic for my daughter for a long time! Her pediatrician said she needed a probiotic AND fiber so I found this online. Was not able to find in store and I am so happy I found it on Amazon because it has helped her so much! No more complaints about tummy pain! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my younger daughter. It's flavorless so you can easily put it in drinks. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Yu

customer_reviews.title: Caution! Contains Wheat.
customer_reviews.text: Contains wheat! Loved this product but can no longer with kids gluten allergy. Such a bummer. Cancelling my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Sage B.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this stuff. My son has it every day. It really helps, my son has a tummy problem &this is the only thing that has ever helped him. So thankful! Definitely reccomend this for parents! A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that helped my daughter’s constipation issues. We put a packet in her bottle with water each day. She never noticed the difference so it must not taste bad, and she was able to pass a bowel every day because of it. This was a lifesaver for us.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Wachter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t know it’s there!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has autism and consolation issues. She can tell if anything is added to her food or drink. This she doesn’t notice! Win! We put it in really cold water in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a very hard time staying regulated. This daily probiotic works wonders!!! It has no taste so we put it in her juice or water and she never has complained. She stays regulated as long as we keep her on it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Chiarappi (Morann)

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: That product did not have my toddler with regularity. She was still constipated even with taken this 3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: JOY  M

product_meta.title: Culturelle Kids Regularity Probiotic & Fiber Dietary Supplement | Helps Restore Regularity & Keeps Kids' Digestive Systems Running Smoothly* | Works Naturally with Child'S Body* | 24 Single Packets
product_meta.description:
Size:24 Count (Pack of 1)

Culturelle Probiotics Products

Designed to promote ongoing digestive and immune health as well as everyday wellness for every member of the family, all products in our line-up feature Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG (LGG), the #1 Clinically Studied Probiotic.*†


Explore Our Wide Range of Probiotic Products

Digestive Health
Culturelle Digestive Health Daily Probiotic Capsules supplement contains naturally sourced ingredients that work with your body to support digestive health.* Ingredients like the proven probiotic strain, Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG (LGG), are shown to help your digestive system work better.*

Pro-Well
Make good choices today for tomorrow by supporting your natural immune defenses. Taking a Culturelle probiotic for everyday wellness gives you a choice to help promote your daily health and wellness routine.* 

Kids
When your kids have occasional tummy troubles or when you just want to help keep them healthy, reach for the children's probiotic brand most recommended by Pediatricians.††† Our line-up of safe probiotic supplements can help keep your little ones feeling their best.* 

Baby
Your baby’s first two years are critical in building a strong foundation for a lifetime of good health. With safe and gentle products designed to work naturally with your baby’s body, Culturelle Baby products help promote your baby’s developing digestive and immune systems, supporting your baby for the best possible start.* 

Important information
Store Culturelle in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children. Inform a healthcare professional before starting any dietary supplement, particularly if there is a known immune-compromised condition. 

†Based on studies with Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG for a range of benefits throughout the lifespan.

†† Based on the number of Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG clinical studies, as of May 2018

≠ Meets the FDA’s guidelines for gluten-free

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: FROM THE #1 PEDIATRICIAN RECOMMENDED PROBIOTIC BRAND, Culturelle Kids Regularity Probiotic & Fiber Packets provide a safe, gentle and drug-free way to help restore regularity and keep kids’ digestive systems running smoothly.*

WITH THE #1 CLINICALLY STUDIED PROBIOTIC STRAIN IN KIDS, 2.5 billion CFU’s of Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG (LGG), to balance intestinal bacteria and minimize discomfort while helping get your child’s digestive system back on track.*
3.5 GRAMS OF DIETARY FIBER, the equivalent of one small apple, sourced from whole fruit kiwi and inulin – a prebiotic vegetable fiber from chicory root.
GENTLE ON A CHILD’S DIGESTIVE SYSTEM. Free of the following: gluten, dairy, and sugar. No harsh stimulants. Best for toddlers and children age 1+, take 1 packet up to three times daily.

NATURALLY SOURCED INGREDIENTS. Contains a unique blend of naturally sourced ingredients developed just for kids’ digestive systems. Flavorless packets; mix into cool food or beverage to serve. Great mixed with applesauce or yogurt.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
